Item.Title: Lucy Hires an English Tutor (Broadcast Version)
Play Syndicated Version (Open & Close)
Item.Description: Beginning in the fall of 1955, I Love Lucy was seen in international syndication, premiering that fall in both Canada and the United Kingdom. We recently discovered a syndicated print of "Redecorating." Note that an announcer was heard during the opening titles, and the show ended with a preview of the following week's episode, "Ricky Loses His Voice."
